attributes.action: Impose on Rail Operators a yearly increase on rail fares of no higher than the real RPI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been revealed that Rail Operatore, First Great Western for one, intend applying bi-annual rail fare increases. The standard of the service (try using the Cotswold Line !) is very sub standard (from a commuter point of view, not a Statistician). IMPROVE SERVICES WITH THE PROFITS ALREADY BEING MADE, PLEASE.
